column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////The salad was pretty good
column2: nice ingredients and it was BIG for the small serving. The family size was gigantic. Get the smaller one and you will have more than enough for two people.We pre-ordered our pizza
column3: so it came out pretty quickly. It was the perfect Chicago style pizza. Nice flavors
column4: crust actually had flavor enough to want to eat it and was a nice texture.
